column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=Today , I decided to bake a cake .
#id=2
#text=First , I preheated the oven to 350 degrees .
#id=3
#text=Then , I gathered all the ingredients I would need .
#id=4
#text=I needed eggs , flour , water , sugar , oil , salt , and baking power .
#id=5
#text=I took a mixing bowl and cracked the eggs into the bowl .
#id=6
#text=Then I measured out the water , followed by the oil .
#id=7
#text=After that , I added the dry ingredients .
#id=8
#text=Then I took a spoon and mixed everything together until it was smooth and there were no more lumps .
#id=9
#text=That 's when the oven beeped to indicate that the oven had reached the correct temperature .
#text=I took out a pan and greased the bottom so that the cake would not stick to it .
#text=Then I poured the mixture from the bowl into the pan .
#text=Because the oven was ready , I put the pan on a rack in the center of the oven .
#text=Then I set the timer to 35 minutes .
#text=When the timer went off , I put on some oven mitts and took the cake out of the oven .
#text=Then I turned off the oven and let the cake cool .
